articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Aussie firms Soul Patts and Brickworks' $9 billion merger sends their shares rocketing - CNBC
articles.description: Stocks of Australian investment firm Washington H. Soul Pattinson and its affiliate Brickworks surged after both companies agreed to merge.
articles.content:
Stocks of Australian investment firm Washington H. Soul Pattinson, also known as Soul Patts, and its affiliate Brickworks surged after both companies announced a A$14 billion ($9 billion) merger.
Sh… [+2110 chars]
